articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
Yuta Kanzawa
Job: Data scientist
Location: Tokyo, Japan
Languages: Japanese, English, German, R, Python, SQL, SAS
Bio: Data Scientist at Janssen Pharmaceutical K.K., a family company of Johnson & Johnson in Tokyo. I have more than 8 years of experience and have worked at Janssen for 4 years collaborating successfully with commercial colleagues and senior management to deliver strategic insights and support decision making through data science.

articles.title: Yuta Kanzawa, Data Scientist
articles.description: Hello! I'm a data scientist based in Tokyo working on applied machine learning, business intelligence and data visualisation. Always under construction.
articles.contents:
Data Visualisations

Toilet paper situations in the world (Global Data Science Project for COVID-19, published on 18th May 2020, updated in June 2020)

OSS
Matplotlib backend implementation for Optuna visualisation functions (August 2020 - Now)
